section.title: Introduction
section.para: This document is created using content written in XML files and compiling those files into different presentation formats. The presentation formats are PDF, Single Page HTML and multiple paged HTML.

note.title: Write Once
note.para: The documentation is written only once in XML and gets converted to PDF and HTML from the same source, making maintenance easy. The documentation can also be kept with the source and committed to the source control system as it is now in ASCII format.

section.para:
The XML files were written according to the Docbook DTD standards and the tools available to convert the Docbook XML files into different presentable formats. The documentation is compiled using open source tool
Velocity Docbook Framework
